Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class NotificationDAO

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.NotificationDAO
public class NotificationDAO extends Object
The class NotificationDAO defines a model for the management of the query of the entity Notifications of the database.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

  • Method Details

    • getAllNotifications

      public ArrayList<Notification> getAllNotifications(User user)
      Gets the list of all notifications of a member user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user.
      Returns:
      the list.

    • insertNotification

      public void insertNotification(int idUser, Integer idBoat, int idFee)
      Inserts a new notification in the database.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the unique code of the user that is to be notified.
      idBoat - the unique code of the boat to which the storage fee refers or null if the fee to be notified is of membership.
      idFee - the unique code of the fee that the member should pay.

    • getNotification

      public Notification getNotification(User user, Boat boat, Fee fee, StatusCode statusCode)
      Gets a notification given some values.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who received the notification.
      boat - the boat to which the storage fee refers or null if the fee to be notified is of membership.
      fee - the fee that the member should pay.
      statusCode - the status code of the notification.
      Returns:
      the reference of the notification or null.

    • existNotificationMembershipFee

      public boolean existNotificationMembershipFee(User user)
      Gets whether the notification of payment of the membership fee exists or not.
      Parameters:
      user - the member who received the notification.
      Returns:
      true in case of notice of payment of the membership fee.

    • existNotificationStorageFee

      public boolean existNotificationStorageFee(User user, Boat boat)
      Gets whether the notification of payment of the storage fee exists or not.
      Parameters:
      user - the member who received the notification.
      boat - the boat to which the storage fee refers.
      Returns:
      true in case of notice of payment of the storage fee.

    • updateStatusCodeNotification

      public void updateStatusCodeNotification(int idUser, Integer idBoat)
      Updates the status of a notification.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the unique code of the member who received the notification.
      idBoat - the unique code of the boat to which the storage fee refers or null if the fee to be notified is of membership.

    • updateNotificationsByFee

      public void updateNotificationsByFee(int idOldFee, int idNewFee)
      Updates all notifications given the unique code of the old fee.
      Parameters:
      idOldFee - the old fee.
      idNewFee - the new fee.

    • getAllNotificationsByFee

      public ArrayList<Notification> getAllNotificationsByFee(int idFee)
      Gets the list of all notifications for the given fee.
      Parameters:
      idFee - the unique code of the fee.
      Returns:
      the list.
